name: adsense_accounts_adunits_get
description: Gets the specified ad unit in the specified ad client for the specified account.

accountId.description: Account to which the ad client belongs.

adClientId.description: Ad client for which to get the ad unit.

fields.description: Selector specifying which fields to include in a partial response.

key.description: API key. Your API key identifies your project and provides you with API access, quota, and reports. Required unless you provide an OAuth 2.0 token.

oauth_token.description: OAuth 2.0 token for the current user.

prettyPrint.description: Returns response with indentations and line breaks.

quotaUser.description: An opaque string that represents a user for quota purposes. Must not exceed 40 characters.

$ul: **code**: Identity code of this ad unit, not necessarily unique across ad clients.
**contentAdsSettings**: Settings specific to content ads (AFC) and highend mobile content ads (AFMC - deprecated).
**backupOption**: The backup option to be used in instances where no ad is available.
**color**: Color to use when type is set to COLOR.
**type**: Type of the backup option. Possible values are BLANK, COLOR and URL.
**url**: URL to use when type is set to URL.
**size**: Size of this ad unit.
**type**: Type of this ad unit.
**customStyle**
**colors**: The colors which are included in the style. These are represented as six hexadecimal characters, similar to HTML color codes, but without the leading hash.
**background**: The color of the ad background.
**border**: The color of the ad border.
**text**: The color of the ad text.
**title**: The color of the ad title.
**url**: The color of the ad url.
**corners**: The style of the corners in the ad (deprecated: never populated, ignored).
**font**: The font which is included in the style.
**family**: The family of the font.
**size**: The size of the font.
**kind**: Kind this is, in this case adsense#adStyle. (default: adsense#adStyle)
**feedAdsSettings**: Settings specific to feed ads (AFF) - deprecated.
**adPosition**: The position of the ads relative to the feed entries.
**frequency**: The frequency at which ads should appear in the feed (i.e. every N entries).
**minimumWordCount**: The minimum length an entry should be in order to have attached ads.
**type**: The type of ads which should appear.
**id**: Unique identifier of this ad unit. This should be considered an opaque identifier; it is not safe to rely on it being in any particular format.
**kind**: Kind of resource this is, in this case adsense#adUnit. (default: adsense#adUnit)
**mobileContentAdsSettings**: Settings specific to WAP mobile content ads (AFMC) - deprecated.
**markupLanguage**: The markup language to use for this ad unit.
**scriptingLanguage**: The scripting language to use for this ad unit.
**size**: Size of this ad unit.
**type**: Type of this ad unit.
**name**: Name of this ad unit.
**savedStyleId**: ID of the saved ad style which holds this ad unit's style information.
**status**: Status of this ad unit. Possible values are:
